text: Julius Packiam is an Indian film score composer. His notable work is in Bollywood movies such as Ek Tha Tiger, Tiger Zinda Hai, Baaghi, Baaghi 2, Bajrangi Bhaijaan, Sultan and Bharat. == Career == His repertoire includes background scores for Tiger franchise, Baaghi franchise, Dhoom 3, Bajrangi Bhaijaan, Sultan, Tubelight, Bharat, etc. == Collaboration == He is a frequent collaborator of director Kabir Khan, Aditya Chopra, Sajid Nadiadwala and Ali Abbas Zafar. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
